title: The Evolution of Vacuum Cleaner Technology
description: Explore the history and advancements in vacuum cleaner technology, from the first manual carpet sweepers to modern robotic vacuums.

sources.title: The invention of the vacuum cleaner, from horse-drawn to high tech ...

article_plan:

- Introduction of canister vacuums

## Technology Integration

- Advancements in filtration systems
- Integration of smart technology in modern vacuum cleaners

## Robotic Revolution

## Conclusion
- Recap of the evolution of vacuum cleaner technology
